data.title: Obituary for Robert Charles Koch, Sr.
meta_keywords: David F. Koch Funeral Home & Cremation Services
data.meta_description: Robert C. 'Bob' Koch, Sr., LCDR-USNR, 95, of Sandusky, passed away early Sunday morning, November 22, 2015, at Firelands Regional Medical Center, Main Campus, Sandusky, after a brief illness.    Born on May 5, 1920, in Sandusky, OH the son of Frederick C. and Louise...
data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Robert Charles Koch, Sr.
data.text: Our support in your time of need does not end after the funeral services. Enter your email below to receive a grief support message from us each day for a year. You can unsubscribe at any time.
